name: Color Me Bourple
description: People have lost their colors, and it's now your job to go out into the world to find them! You are like a color sponge--picking up a color will change your own. Combine red and blue, and you will become purple! In this 2D puzzle platformer, objects will appear and disappear depending on what color you are. Bring the color that your friends used to be, and restore color to society.
